text: The 2018 Khabarovsk Krai gubernatorial election was held on September 2018, on common election day. The first round was held on 9 September, with none of the candidates gaining an absolute majority (50% + 1 vote), causing a run-off vote. The second round was held on 23 September, between the top two candidates, the Liberal Democratic candidate Sergei Furgal and the incumbent Governor Vyacheslav Shport, nominated by the United Russia.В четырех регионах России пройдет второй тур губернаторских выборов Both of them scored 35% of the vote in the first round. In the second round, Sergei Furgal was elected Governor of Khabarovsk Krai with 69.57% of the vote. ==Candidate== Five candidates were registered to participate in the electionСведения о кандидатах.
